successes.title: The Pocket Drone - Your personal flying robot
successes.description: The world's first multicopter that's powerful enough to carry a high quality action camera and folds up smaller than a 7in tablet.

Pledges.description: Wall of Eternal Gratitude: Every supporter at this level with be immortalized as a founding supporter on our website, so you'll get to brag to all your friends and make up a cool call sign like Joe "The Iceman" Smith.

International Wall of Eternal Gratitude: (use this if you have an address outside the US) Every supporter at this level with be immortalized as a founding supporter on our website, so you'll get to brag to all your friends and make up a cool call sign like Joe "The Iceman" Smith.

A set of our exclusive propellers [EARLY BIRD]: 4x optimized collapsible propellers: Our revolutionary and proprietary collapsible propellers make it easier and safer to transport any multirotor vehicle. You'll be rewarded with a full set for up to a quad (2xCW and 2xCCW). These will fit on most motors with the included propeller adapter for either a 3mm, 3.17mm or 4mm motor shafts. We highly recommend upgrading to The Pocket Drone for the full experience.

A set of our exclusive propellers: 4x optimized collapsible propellers: Our revolutionary and proprietary collapsible propellers make it easier and safer to transport any multirotor vehicle. You'll be rewarded with a full set for up to a quad (2xCW and 2xCCW). These will fit on most motors with the included propeller adapter for either a 3mm, 3.17mm or 4mm motor shafts. We highly recommend upgrading to The Pocket Drone for the full experience.

Bind and Fly Package [Early Bird]: For experienced flyers who want to bring their own controller - 1x Ready to Fly Pocket Drone, 1x Pocket Drone Light Neoprene Case, 1x Lipo Battery Pack, 1x Lipo Battery Charger, 1x DSM2 compatible receiver, 1x 5.8Mhz telemetry with micro USB dongle, Requires your own DSM2 compatible transmitter

Bind and Fly Package: For experienced flyers who want to bring their own controller - 1x Ready to Fly Pocket Drone, 1x Pocket Drone Light Neoprene Case, 1x Lipo Battery Pack, 1x Lipo Battery Charger, 1x DSM2 compatible receiver, 1x 5.8Mhz telemetry with micro USB dongle, Requires your own DSM2 compatible transmitter

International Bind and Fly Package: (Select this option for international shipping) For experienced flyers who want to bring their own controller - 1x Ready to Fly Pocket Drone, 1x Pocket Drone Light Neoprene Case, 1x Lipo Battery Pack, 1x Lipo Battery Charger, 1x DSM2 compatible receiver, 1x telemetry with micro USB dongle, Requires your own DSM2 compatible transmitter. Please note that for international shipping you will be responsible for paying local taxes in your country upon receipt. Exact taxes will vary by locality.
Ready to Fly Package [Early Bird]: Includes everything you need to operate your own drone. Best option for most people - 1x Six Channel Radio Controller, 1x Everything From Bind and Fly package
Ready to Fly Package: Includes everything you need to operate your own drone. Best option for most people - 1x Six Channel Radio Controller, 1x Everything From Bind and Fly package

International Ready to Fly Package: (select this option for international shipping) Includes everything you need to operate your own drone. Best option for most people - 1x Six Channel Radio Controller, 1x Everything From Bind and Fly package. Please note that for international shipping you will be responsible for paying local taxes in your country upon receipt. Exact taxes will vary by locality.

Aerial Video/Photo Package [Early Bird]: For those who want everything they need to start taking videos and photos - 1x High quality action camera capable of recording 1080 HD video and drone mounts, 1x Everything From Ready to Fly Package

Aerial Video/Photo Package: For those who want everything they need to start taking videos and photos - 1x High quality action camera capable of recording 1080 HD video and drone mounts, 1x Everything From Ready to Fly Package

International Aerial Video/Photo Package: (select this option for international shipping) For those who want everything they need to start taking videos and photos - 1x High quality action camera capable of recording 1080 HD video and drone mounts, 1x Everything From Ready to Fly Package. Please note that for international shipping you will be responsible for paying local taxes in your country upon receipt. Exact taxes will vary by locality.
